_metadata.description: Synthetic test data for Client Timesheet Application
_metadata.warning: THIS IS TEST DATA ONLY - Not for production use

scenario_1_user_authentication.description: Email-based login entries covering diverse user roles
scenario_1_user_authentication.method: Synthetic email addresses using RFC 2606 reserved domains (@example.com, @testdomain.com)
scenario_1_user_authentication.rationale: Covers QA, dev, PM, admin, contractor, and intern roles to test the full spectrum of user types

scenario_2_client_management.description: Adding and managing client information across industries
scenario_2_client_management.method: Fictional company names with generic industry descriptions and test-domain contact emails
scenario_2_client_management.rationale: Covers tech, finance, healthcare, retail, manufacturing, logistics, airlines, education, data, and cloud industries

data.name: Acme Tech Solutions
data.description: Test client - Software development consulting

data.description: Test client - Financial advisory and reporting

scenario_3_time_entry_tracking.description: Recording work hours for different clients with varied tasks
scenario_3_time_entry_tracking.method: Realistic consulting activities with hours ranging from 0.5 to 8.0 across a two-week period
scenario_3_time_entry_tracking.rationale: Covers sprint planning, development, reviews, testing, meetings, and deployments to represent typical consultant workflows

scenario_4_reporting.description: Work entries across multiple users/clients to enable report generation and aggregation
scenario_4_reporting.method: Multi-user work entries for clients 6-10 enabling per-client report queries with aggregated hours
scenario_4_reporting.rationale: Tests report generation with varying entry counts and total hours per client, covering multiple users

scenario_5_data_export.description: Dense work entries for a single client to produce rich CSV/PDF export output
scenario_5_data_export.method: Multiple entries for Acme Tech Solutions (client 1) spanning a full month with varied hours and task types
scenario_5_data_export.rationale: Tests export functionality with sufficient volume, including edge cases like fractional hours (0.75), max hours (8.0), and varied description lengths
